full_description:
Havit PB90 10000mAh Power Bank

The Havit PB90 10000mAh Power Bank is a portable charging device that provides a convenient solution for charging your electronic devices on the go. With a capacity of 10000mAh, it offers a substantial amount of power to keep your devices charged throughout the day. The power bank features multiple input and output options for versatile charging capabilities. It supports MicroUSB and Type-C input voltages, allowing you to recharge the power bank using either of these connectors. The MicroUSB input supports DC5V/2.0A, 9V/2.0A, and 12V/1.5A (18W) charging options, while the Type-C input supports DC5V/2.0A, 9V/2.0A, and 12V/1.5A (18W) charging options as well. The Havit PB90 offers two USB ports (USB1 and USB2) and a Type-C port. The USB ports support DC 5V/4.5A, 5V/2.4A, 9V/2A, and 12V/1.5A (22.5W) output options, providing fast charging for your devices. The Type-C port offers DC 5V/2.4A, 9V/2.22A, and 12V/1.67A (20W) output options. The power bank is designed with convenience in mind, featuring a compact and lightweight build. It is constructed using ABS materials, which provide durability and a sleek appearance. The Havit PB90 is equipped with Micro USB, Type-C, and two USB connectors, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of devices. The Havit PB90 10000mAh Power Bank is a reliable and efficient charging solution that allows you to stay powered up while on the move. Its versatile input and output options, along with its compact design, make it a convenient accessory for anyone in need of portable power.

full_description:
Havit PB56 40000mAh Power Bank

The Havit PB56 40000mAh Power Bank is a portable charging device that offers a high capacity of 40000mAh, allowing you to charge multiple devices on the go. It features multiple input options, including Micro, Lightning, and Type-C ports, which support various charging voltages and currents. The Micro input operates at 5V 2A or 9V 2A, while the Lightning input supports SV 2A, and the Type-C input offers 5V 2.4A or 9V 2A. The power bank offers USB1 with a maximum output of 5V 3A, 9V 2A, or 12V 1.5A. USB2, USB3, and USB4 ports provide a constant output of 5V 3A. The Type-C output supports 5V 3A, 9V 2A, or 12V 1.5A. The total output of the USB and Type-C ports combined is 5V 3.6A (maximum). This power bank is the ability to charge multiple devices simultaneously. With both Type-C and USB ports, it can charge up to five mobile phone devices at the same time, making it ideal for situations where multiple devices require charging. The Havit PB56 includes an LED lamp, making it useful for outdoor activities or emergencies. The LED lighting adds to its versatility and functionality. The power bank's large capacity of 40000mAh ensures that it can meet the charging needs of multiple devices, making it suitable for various scenarios such as travel, outdoor activities, and business offices. The Type-C port of the power bank supports fast charging with PD (Power Delivery) protocol. This means that it can deliver high-speed charging to compatible devices and also receive fast charging when connected to a PD-compatible power source. The Havit PB56 also comes with a self-corded design, providing convenience for charging different mobile phones. It includes micro, lightning, and Type-C cables that are built into the power bank itself, eliminating the need to carry additional cables separately. The Havit PB56 40000mAh Power Bank offers a large capacity, multiple charging options, simultaneous charging capability, LED lighting, and fast charging compatibility, making it a versatile and reliable charging solution for various situations.
